nodes.text: Silik lizards were rare reptiles native to the Silent Desert on Tython. They were a silicon-based life form that were able to absorb energy from the sand.

The silik lizards were around size of Human adult and had silicon-based skin with spines on their bodies. With the ability to stand up on their back legs, this six limbed lizard was a formidable foe which was prized as a hunting trophy.

Although the silik lizard was able to absorb energy from the sand and use this to sustain themselves and produce sparks, they would also kill mammals and eat their spinal fluid to supplement their diets. Before attacking, they would let out a scream that was silent in the Silent Desert on Tython.
